name: frontend
description: - Installation de `axios`:  ```bash npm install axios ``` - Installation de `Tailwind Css`: ```bash npm install -D tailwindcss npx tailwindcss init ``` config: ```javascript /** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */ module.exports = {   content: ["./src/**/*.{html,js}"],   theme: {     extend: {},   },   plugins: [], } ``` ```css @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; ``` ```bash npx tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./src/output.css --watch ``` - Installation de DaisyUI: ```bash npm i -D daisyui@latest ``` - Installation et Utilisation d'un server local:     1. Installation du server     ```bash     npm install -g http-server     ```     2. Utilisation du server     ```bash     http-server -p 3000     ```
